content:
**14 March | Competitive Play Explained**

> **How To Play ?**
A : Join Solo Or As A Team Of Three
**Random Modes And Maps !**

A New Ranking System Used For Match Making

**Banning & Picking Phase**
Ban the brawler that you don't want to play against. In the next round, pick the best counter to your opponent

[More On Twitter](https://twitter.com/brawlstars)
